description: AI-powered web content extraction, search, and classification

actions.name: classify_content
actions.description: Assign categories to text or images using the Classifier API (zero-shot/few-shot).

actions.name: deepsearch_query
actions.description: Answer complex questions through iterative search, reading, and reasoning with the DeepSearch API.

actions.name: extract_webpage_content
actions.description: Convert a URL into clean, LLM-friendly Markdown using the Reader API.

actions.name: train_custom_classifier
actions.description: Fine-tune a classifier with labeled examples for domain-specific tasks.

actions.name: web_search_summarization
actions.description: Perform a web search and retrieve summarized results using the Reader API.
